title: (28380) Colmenar de Oreja - 38B Calle de San Sebastián
title_short: (28380) Colmenar de Oreja - 38B Calle de San Sebastián
description: NEW MOTORHOMES PARKING AREA IN COLMENAR DE OREJA (MADRID) The Colmenar de Oreja City Council enables a new parking space for motorhomes, caravans and campers next to the Jardines de los Huertos and the Hermitage of San Isidro, near the town historical, which will facilitate sightseeing for itinerant travelers. The parking area has: - Shaded wooded area - Children's play area - Picnic area - Drinking water - Capacity 8 vehicles - Free area - Allows overnight (maximum 48h) - Nearby gas station - Supermarkets in the vicinity - Restaurants in the proximity - Wine cellars in the proximity - Next to the historic center of Colmenar de Oreja, declared a Site of Cultural Interest. - Cycling routes (Ciclamadrid Aranjuez-Chinchón and Ciclamadrid Belmonte-Villarejo de Salvanés) - Hiking routes (Vereda del Cristo, Train Route, Fountains Route, Tagus Route) * Does not have: drainage of gray / black water, connection electrical

TRAIN station at 1.5km and BUS (421) at 200m, both take you to Madrid in 30' and 45'. Large park with many spaces and a beautiful lake, a commercial area right next to it with the cheapest laundromat and petrol station in Spain.

Very quiet both day and night. Children's playgrounds and a large park with green areas nearby. Tram 2 min away with a connection in 10 min to the Madrid renfe commuter train without transfer. Quiet and safe area (AC parked all year), away from noise. Possible access to gym and supermarket toilet. Suitable for all types of vehicle sizes.

title: (28991) Torrejón de la Calzada - 12 Calle Ribera
title_short: (28991) Torrejón de la Calzada - 12 Calle Ribera
description: Open area in the middle of a small pine forest, across the street there is a pine park closed with benches and tables. Near a Mercadona and the exit of the town. Direct buses to Madrid (Plaza eliptica) and to Parla (Renfe with stop at Puerta del Sol)

title: (45789) Turleque -
description: Near the dam and its huge lake, several car parks used during the day by local fishermen. Breathtaking view.

title: (45789) Turleque -
description: Alone in the world by the lake, feet in the water. at the entrance of the lake a garbage can, remember to bring your waste there. very nice spot with duck and fish in the lake.

title: (45890) Cabezamesada - 3 Calle la Piedad
description: Public water source, in the center of a small town, next to the square. Just load clean water. Do not pour neither gray nor black. Let's respect the environment and the neighbors. Garbage container right next to it and store, bank, pharmacy nearby.

title: (16400) Tarancón -
description: Private estate ideal for a break, overnight allowed maximum 48 hours, with good access, located about 4 km from Tarancón on the A-40, quiet place. It is currently being improved so that in the future it will have filling and emptying services for deposits, the price will be used to improve the facilities. Please call.

title: (28983) Parla - 1 Avenida Cerro del Rubal
description: Gas station with washing boxes, includes a track with a platform. It has a wash with Wax Pro colored foam.

title: (28500) Madrid - 4X Diseminado Cr M 3020
description:
A well equipped and little crowded lagoon. Daytime only. Large AC fits well in the parking lot. Good place to spend the day or to rest. You pay €1 to enter and enjoy the picnic tables, the play area and bathroom. There is a restaurant/cafeteria (in it the toilets). Great place for a break near Madrid. Outside the enclosure there is a place to park and possibly spend the night (we did not stay).
Be careful when entering because you pass the Laguna sign (it is half covered with vegetation) and then when you go down the hill it seems that it is closed but there is a small door to the left of the gate.
In the parking lot there are more than 40 spaces and around 30 tables inside (not all of them have shade)

title: (45400) Mora - 2 Carretera Cementerio
description: Mini 3-seater ac area with gray discharge grid in each square. To the left there is a sewage box (marked WC) and behind it in wall cupboard is the fresh water. Its a bit difficult to locate everything but it works for servicing, if you don't need electricity, it does its job.

title: (28983) Parla - C. de Pinto
description: Elefanteazul car washing

title: (45420) Almonacid de Toledo - 1 Calle Santa Bárbara
title_short: (45420) Almonacid de Toledo - 1 Calle Santa Bárbara
description: Fantastic place at the castle ruins "Castillo Almonacid de Toledo" with a magnificent all-round view and a fantastic sunset. Space for two or three vehicles. Unsuitable for larger vehicles, as the drive in the village leads through very narrow streets.

title: (45789) Caserío Venta Vieja -
description:
Not so difficult to access through sand roads. ok for bigger vans.

the spot is very calm, 100% nature. it's beautiful as well. But! 

it's a little dirty... we gathered 4 big trash bags in a 50m radius and were happy to clean the nature a little.

come with your kids and teach them to clean natural spots!

nasty bits appart, it's beautiful and calm and in the middle of nowhere, I'll come again to clean a different spot:)

title: (28500) - 16D Diseminado Cm de Alcala
description: It's a fairground car park, great to spend a night on your trip with the motorhome or camper if you are very tired. It is a quiet area where you can go unnoticed.

title: (45400) Mora - 37 Calle Manzaneque
description: Laundry. Hours from 8 a.m. to 11 p.m.

title: (16470) Belinchón - 23 Calle Alfonso VIII
description: The church ground parking lot. We were very quiet because we had houses in front of us. The neighbors did not make a problem but they looked at us something strange. In the town square, you can probably also park.

title: (45860) Villacañas - 78 Poligono 11
description: Leisure area with tables and benches (two of which are rented). Quiet (with a road nearby but very little traffic). No limited parking but with designated places.

title: (45007) Toledo - 36 Calle Río Guadarrama
description: Washers and dryers suitable for all types and sizes of clothing and with washer and dryer exclusively for pet clothing. You don't need to carry detergents. Wash and dry in about an hour. Spacious and comfortable premises, with free wifi. Easy parking.

title: (45400) Mora - 24 Camino Santa Lucía
description: Parking of the municipal soccer field. No services. During the day somewhat crowded, but at night it is quiet to sleep. Next to the swimming pool and municipal park.

title: () Parla -
description: Just behind McDonald's and Burger King there is a massive car park where trucks park. Free Wi-Fi and toilets in McDonald's and Burger King. There are 2 supermarkets next door, one of them low-cost. A bit noisy due to road next door.

title: (45400) Mora - 0 Carretera Orgaz-Manzaneque
description: Parking area without services and with some shade. Very close to sports areas, municipal swimming pool, civil guard and a park with grass and shade.

title: (28984) Parla - 4 Avenida Torres Quevedo
description:
Large parking strip at Decathlon. is new area under development. Fine to spend the night.
Quiet area.

No service.

title: (28560) Carabaña - 16 Camino de Orusco
description: Parking next to the municipal swimming pool. They are small places so you will need two places for your motorhome. Very busy summer weekends.

title: (28500) Arganda del Rey - 2 Poligono Vp. Norte Poligonos
title_short: (28500) Arganda del Rey - 2 Poligono Vp. Norte Poligonos
description: Good and quiet place to spend the day, good price, 8 euros during the week and 14 on weekends (Saturday Sunday). They allow animals. Option to take you to the metro to go to Madrid. It is parking for caravans, motorhomes and trucks.

title: (28971) Griñón - 151A Paseo del Carraperal
description: I live next to this place and I see Cars heading to this point and they have to turn around. The place is very bad, if you have no choice in any part of the town as there is a wide street, I would spend the night, now traveling here thinking that it is a good place, I do not recommend it.

title: (28521) Rivas-Vaciamadrid - Autovía del Este, 581
description: Small parking lot, easy access from the highway but almost no noise. Feels like you’re in nature but still very close to the city. Walking routes right by, so great if you have a dog. Didn’t stay overnight but didn’t see any signs prohibiting it.

title: (45216) Carranque - Camino Egido
description: Motorhome area, it is assumed that there are two parking spaces, but they are still occupied by cars, you can certainly spend the night, we just drained.

title: (45215) El Viso de San Juan - 2034 Carretera Carranque
title_short: (45215) El Viso de San Juan - 2034 Carretera Carranque
description: Self-service laundry next to the Gas Station.

title: (28595) Estremera - 18 Diseminado Cm Vereda
description: Quiet, a lot of shade but quite dirty. Small fluvial beach with current. With bar and services. To cool off, rest and sleep near Madrid

title: (45280) Olías del Rey - 22B Carretera Madrid Toledo
title_short: (45280) Olías del Rey - 22B Carretera Madrid Toledo
description: Gas Station (Cepsa) with free water

title: (45430) Mascaraque - CM42
description: Service station with free drinking water.

title: (16400) Tarancón - 118 Avenida Miguel de Cervantes
description: "DO LAUNDRY" A laundromat in the town of Tarancón. Has 2 machines 12 kg and 1 machine 16 kg and 2 dryers. Also has a pet clothes machine and dryer. No internet or toilets. Street parking or park on the dirt lot mapped out on Park4night.

title: (28521) Rivas-Vaciamadrid - 153 Avenida Campillo de San Isidro
title_short: (28521) Rivas-Vaciamadrid - 153 Avenida Campillo de San Isidro
description: Signposted area for motorhomes. Quiet

title: (16400) Tarancón - 3 Calle Evilasio Martínez Bueno
description: Signposted public parking. Quiet neighborhood with nearby shops and parks. 15 minutes from the center on foot

title: (28970) Humanes de Madrid - Unnamed Road
description: In the middle of nature fountains to fill up water .dust bins quiet nights.lake with ducks and turtles

title: (28521) Rivas-Vaciamadrid - 10 Calle Thomas Edison
description: Decathlon parking very quiet. We were also parked during the day and everything was perfect.

title: (16400) Tarancón - 3 Camino Catorce
description: Several parking spaces in line in the urban area of Tarancón next to the Parque de la Juventud. It is not a specific area for motorhomes but it is in a discreet place where you can park and even spend the night without too much trouble.

title: (45280) Olías del Rey - 3 Carretera Madrid Toledo, A-42 SALIDA 59 Via de Servicio
title_short: (45280) Olías del Rey - 3 Carretera Madrid Toledo, A-42 SALIDA 59 Via de Servicio
description: Free parking on the motorway Toledo-Madrid A42. Quiet place in the parking lot of a small hostel and restaurant. The sound of the cars on the highway is heard. The church in this town is beautiful

address.street: 3 Carretera Madrid Toledo, A-42 SALIDA 59 Via de Servicio

title: (16400) Tarancón - 9D Calle General Emilio Villaescusa
description: Ground parking without services. Next to the Adif station.

title: (28521) Rivas-Vaciamadrid - 3V Lugar Parque Rivas
description: Asphalt and dirt parking without prohibition sign no height bar, trees for shade. Next to Carrefour and other stores. No services. Restrooms in the mall.

title: (45860) Villacañas - Camino del Romeral a las Pueblas
title_short: (45860) Villacañas - Camino del Romeral a las Pueblas
description: Perfect for resting and strolling along the river off the road 1 km

address.street: Camino del Romeral a las Pueblas

title: (28522) - 1A Lugar Parque Rivas
description: Discreet parking next to the FeuVert del Carrefour, it is not so busy, employees' cars usually park, the parking lights turn off at 23:23, bathrooms inside the carrefour. I have not been disturbed at any time. Well clean area. Wifi inside the carrefour.

title: (45006) Nambroca - 76 Calle de las Vaguadas
description:
Quiet parking at the entrance of urbanization the snows
Some Saturdays weddings are held in the restaurant and parking is full. Otherwise it is empty.
Food stores
pharmacy restaurants
Asphalted and flat
Illuminated at night.

title: (28946) Madrid - s/n Camino de la Vega
title_short: (28946) Madrid - s/n Camino de la Vega
description: If you need to make a stop on the way to TOLEDO, it is a good place, always leaving it as it is. A few meters gas station and municipal swimming pool. La Pollina recreational area, with excellent 3 game parks for the little ones. Picnic areas, soccer field and basketball. Free public toilets. Very flat area, with no slope or height, width or length limitations.

title: (28904) Getafe - 26 Avenida Reyes Catolicos
description: Parking day and night, without services, near the highway, near the Miguel Hernández school. There is a fountain and several parks. At night, very quiet. Next to the Metro station and near the city center. In Calle Madrid there are plenty of great places for having beer & tapas.

title: (28510) Campo Real - 19 Carretera de Madrid
description: It is a small car park, but there is usually room, they have a great water fountain, there is a grill bar and a shop with many products from the area.

name: Camping ALPHA Madrid
title: (28906) Camping ALPHA Madrid
description: Camping Alpha Madrid, shaded ground, access Madrid center by bus.

title: (28906) Getafe - 6E Calle de Bachiller Alonso López
title_short: (28906) Getafe - 6E Calle de Bachiller Alonso López
description: Residential area next to the polygon, climbing wall a few meters away, a very safe and pleasant place to sleep, it is parking on the street so cars pass by, it is undeniable but still very good. Dog and children's park and bars and terraces very close. But above all, a very safe area.

title: (28522) Rivas-Vaciamadrid - 12 Calle José Luis Sampedro
description:
Very quiet area, next to the usual parking area for neighboring motorhomes. Glued to the local police with surveillance cameras in the area.
the water fountain works in summer
Litter bins.
A restaurant next door and a cafeteria/teteria.
Buses next door and metro 5 min with large parking.
Large motorhomes enter, it is usually free, if it is full in the vicinity there is always room.

title: (28905) Getafe - s/n Avenida Adolfo Suárez
description: Spacious parking near a park and within walking distance of a metro station. Little traffic . Didn't stay overnight here. There is a bar next to the car park, so there is social control. It might be busy here on a Sunday afternoon.

title: (28051) Madrid - 34I Autopista M-50
description: Parking with hotel and restaurant. Possibility to eat or just park. Car wash present.

title: (28944) Fuenlabrada - 1 Plaza de Alua
description: To wash and dry clothes, market next door

title: (28905) - 9Q Poligono Vp. Buenavista
description: Parking area in the surroundings of a new and quiet neighborhood (Cerro Buenavista). Views of central Madrid and access on foot to a park with a lake, several children's play areas and various shops. Next to a supermarket SaveMas. In the area with views of Madrid, it is somewhat inclined, but if you turn left at the roundabout, it is much better, right in front of a meadow of grass.

title: (28970) Humanes de Madrid - 6 Avenida de la Industria
title_short: (28970) Humanes de Madrid - 6 Avenida de la Industria
description: Washes very well, platform on the roof

title: (28943) Fuenlabrada - 1 Calle de Creta
description: Area with some flat places along the road, where you can park to visit Fuenlabrada.

title: (45789) Turleque - CM-4133
description: Roadside bar with space to stop and some shadows, little stop along the way

title: (28970) Humanes de Madrid - 4 Avenida de las Flores
title_short: (28970) Humanes de Madrid - 4 Avenida de las Flores
description: Gas station with washing machine for motorhomes with a pressure water gun has a walkway and you can clean the roof of the motorhome, it also has repsol bottles

title: (28522) Rivas-Vaciamadrid - 340 Calle de Junkal
description: Zone indicated to park day and night. Without services.

title: (28903) Getafe - C. Madrid
description: Large free parking at the train station.

title: (28596) Brea de Tajo - 4 Camino F
description: Ideal motorhome area to discover Madrid's Alcarria and spend up to 5 nights. Playground, picnic area and viewpoint with excellent views of the Vega del Tajo. Water filling and emptying, 12 220v outlets 24 hours a day. Bars, tobacconist, pharmacy and supermarket at 100m. Hiking trails from the area. Camper friendly town

title: (28903) Getafe - 11 Calle Rosa Luxemburgo
description: Parking of the soccer field. Quiet. We have spent the night without problem.

title: (28941) Fuenlabrada - Calle de Zaragoza
description: Parking next to Renfe train station, quiet night, you hear trains.

title: (28891) Velilla de San Antonio - 32 Calle de Doctor Alcorta
title_short: (28891) Velilla de San Antonio - 32 Calle de Doctor Alcorta
description: Laundry on the same street you can not park but a couple of streets as leaving the town there is an esplanade where you can park without problem and from there to the laundry there is a 5 min walk I hope it helps

title: (28950) Moraleja de Enmedio - 1E Arroyo Caño
description:
Aparcamiento gratuito en vía pública. Los aparcamientos no son muy amplios, por lo que es más para furgonetas pequeñas/medianas que para autocaravanas o Camper de grandes dimensiones.
Al lado está el centro de Salud, hay un restaurante y un supermercado.
Tranquilo para pasar la noche. Aunque por la mañana hay trasiego de coches.

title: (28523) Rivas-Vaciamadrid - 3 Plaza de Blas de Otero
title_short: (28523) Rivas-Vaciamadrid - 3 Plaza de Blas de Otero
description: Laundry open until 10 p.m. every day

title: (28907) Getafe - 10 Carretera Madrid - Toledo
description: Washing room for motorhomes with a walkway that helps to reach the top of the car, although to wash the roof is a bit complicated, I had to climb the railing to reach it.

title: (28891) Velilla de San Antonio - 1 Calle de la Viña
title_short: (28891) Velilla de San Antonio - 1 Calle de la Viña
description: Parking lot to sleep with a water source although many times it does not go there are also places to buy next to it, it is near the town square and then also next to it are the ponds a beautiful place to fish or hike, in the same parking lot is the park great for kids. On TUESDAYs on the closest side of the flats you cannot park because they put on a flea market.

title: (45850) La Villa de Don Fadrique - 33A Calle Gibraltar
title_short: (45850) La Villa de Don Fadrique - 33A Calle Gibraltar
description: Free public parking. Quiet zone. Directly opposite there is a free emptying and filling service. Children's play area and very close to bakery and supermarket. On Mondays there is a market right next door and there is a municipal scale for each wallet.

title: (28523) Rivas-Vaciamadrid - 2T Calle Pamplona
description: Big parking lot all along the road right next to the metro station. Day and night allowed. We slept for one night without a problem and left our van in the day to go into Madrid. Parking spaces are about average length. We could fit our 6 meter van in a space. Might struggle if you’re longer.

title: (28891) Velilla de San Antonio - Cam. de los Tomillares
title_short: (28891) Velilla de San Antonio - Cam. de los Tomillares
description: I found this place looking for a place away from large bottles and people at night on the weekend. The access road is very bumpy and there is a slope that requires a 4x4 or at least a vehicle with a rear lock.

title: (28523) Rivas-Vaciamadrid - 691 Paseo de las Provincias
description:
Location reserved for vehicles other than cars, several other locations along this walk
200 meters from the Madrid Metro. ATTENTION: buy a combined ticket. shopping center at 500mts.

title: (28051) Madrid - 38C Poligono UZP0103 Ensanche Vallecas
description: Good place to spend a night. Quiet and without noise. There is a cafeteria next door for breakfast, 100% recommended.

title: (28914) Leganés - 2B Calle Parla
description: Ample parking with level spaces next to the commuter train that leaves you in Atocha in 20 minutes. Good for visiting Madrid, although we have not stayed overnight, it seems like a quiet and safe place. Public toilets at the train station when it is open. There is a large park next door with picnic areas, ping pong tables and swings for children

title: (28950) Moraleja de Enmedio - 18 Camino la Dehesa
title_short: (28950) Moraleja de Enmedio - 18 Camino la Dehesa
description: Parking next to the sports courts. Very wide, quite level. The noise from the power station is barely audible. The road at night is little traveled. The parking lot lights stay on.

title: (28942) Fuenlabrada - 5Z Poligono VPV.036.PPI
description: Parking area, very quiet place during the day and at night. In front of the Fuenlabrada fire department. A Burger King next door and Mercadona 3 min walk.

title: (28523) Rivas-Vaciamadrid - 2V Ronda Gijón
description: Place to park  day and night. Children's playground 20 meters from the parking lot. Commercial center with toilets, supermarket and bars.There are many areas like this in the whole municipality of Rivas Vaciamadrid

title: (28051) Madrid - 24 Calle Villamanta
description: Highly recommended climbing wall, with plenty of space to park the motorhome.

title: (28914) Leganés - 16 Avenida de la Lengua Española
title_short: (28914) Leganés - 16 Avenida de la Lengua Española
description: Free parking 24 hours very wide.

title: (28942) Fuenlabrada - s/n Paseo Loranca
description: Large parking space with no facilities next to the agricultural park. Busy during the day and larger street nearby. It is not a very nice place but ok if you need to spend a night in this area.

title: (28916) Leganés - Avenida de Gran Bretaña
description: Norauto car park in Commercial Centre Parquesur, many places, I had to stay there because of a breakdown. In the morning I saw other van on the commercial centre car park. Free wifi and toilets in the commercial centre. a bit noisy

title: (28916) Leganés - Avenida de Gran Bretaña
description: Unpaved parking next to the Parquesur shopping center. Quiet area at night ideal for overnight. Bathrooms in the mall and can be emptied gray and fill water in the laundry that is stuck.

title: (28031) Madrid - 62G Calle del Barranco del Novillo
title_short: (28031) Madrid - 62G Calle del Barranco del Novillo
description: It is a street of a park, near the subway, the squares are large and wide. Ideal for sleeping in squares that are located between two tall buildings of ORTIZ. Near the LA GAVIA subway station and the shopping center of the same name that is reached on foot.
